posts.input: I learned a big lesson about failing quickly and pivoting in my startup.
posts.output: Failure isn't the opposite of success, it's a stepping stone. üöÄ In my early startup days, I clung to an idea for far too long, convinced it would eventually work. The market, however, had other plans. It was a tough pill to swallow, but I learned one of the most invaluable lessons: the power of failing fast and pivoting even faster. Instead of wasting months, we shifted our strategy in weeks, embracing user feedback and market signals. This quick adaptation saved us from a deeper hole and ultimately led us to a much stronger product-market fit. Don't be afraid to let go of what isn't working. Your next big win might just be a pivot away. What's the biggest lesson failure has taught you? Share your insights below! #StartupLessons #Entrepreneurship #Pivot #LearningFromFailure #Innovation

posts.input: I was recognized by a recruiter for a bank because of my LinkedIn posts
posts.output:
You never know who's watching. The interviewer for a TOP finance bank recognized me from my LinkedIn content.

When you put yourself out there, it's inevitable that people will see your progress‚Äîand you will stand out more than a referral ever could. üòº

COMMENT 'TOP' to learn how to ACTUALLY stand out to recruiters of ANY industry!

posts.input: I quit cold DMing people and created a tool to automate the process to get to the people I wanted to talk to
posts.output:
I stopped sending cold DMs.

 It usually took me around 4 warm intros to get me to the person I wanted to talk to.

 I automated the whole process.

 Here‚Äôs how it works:

 pathways.ai takes in your linkedin and TARGET person.

 finds ALL possible connection paths and rank by the MOST likehood of you reaching them.

 then, generates cold DMs and intiates warm intros

 (based off MY successful cold DMs & warm intros!!)

 goes through those routes, automatically switching to the next BEST option if one fails.

 you NEVER have to send a cold dm again.

 COMMENT ‚ÄúIN‚Äù to be the FIRST ones to use this tool when released.
